notice.ch: 1.欲以密碼卡加選的同學，請於9/13（星期三）上課時領取，逾時不再發放密碼卡。2.強烈建議修習CM1010前，須先修習CM1009

remark.ch: 1.欲以密碼卡加選的同學，請於9/13（星期三）上課時領取，逾時不再發放密碼卡。2.強烈建議修習CM1010前，須先修習CM1009

goal.ch: 基本上透過教科書來學習化學的基本概念及解決化學的問題。希望幫助學生學會像一個化學家般的思考，他們可將解決問題的過程，應用他們在各方面的生活上。
goal.en: Conceptual learning and problem solving have been fundamental to our approach in chemistry through the textbook. We hope to help students learn to think like a chemist so they can apply the process of problem solving to all aspects of their lives.

outline.ch: 原則上授課 13 章：1. 實驗與測量；2. 原子、分子與離子；3. 反應裡的質量關係；4. 水溶液的反應；5. 週期性與原子的電子結構；6. 離子化合物：週期性趨勢與鍵節理論；7. 共價鍵與電子點結構式；8. 共價鍵：價鍵理論與分子結構；9. 熱化學：化學能；10. 氣體：性質與行為；11. 液體與相變化；12. 固體；13. 溶液與其性質。
outline.en: Going to have 13 chapters: 1. Chemical Tools: Experimentation and Measurement; 2. Atoms, Molecules, and Ions; 3. Mass Relationships in Chemical Reactions; 4. Reactions in Aqueous Solution; 5. Periodicity and the Electronic Structure of Atoms; 6. Ionic Compounds: Periodic Trends and Bonding Theory; 7. Covalent Bonding and Electron-Dot Structures; 8. Covalent Compounds: Bonding Theories and Molecular Structure; 9. Thermochemistry: Chemical Energy; 10. Gases: Their Properties and Behavior; 11. Liquids and Phase Changes; 12. Solids; 13. Solutions and Their Properties.

textbook.ch: Chemistry，第八版，Jill K. Robinson、John E. McMurry 與 Robert C. Fay 合著
textbook.en: Chemistry, 8th ed. by Jill K. Robinson, John E. McMurry and Robert C. Fay. Published by Pearson Prentice Hall

gradMethod.ch: 點名 12％、小考 10％、期中考 I  30％、期中考 II  30％、期末考  30％，考試日期於上課時宣佈。
gradMethod.en: Roll call 12％; Quizzes 10％; Midterm I 30％; Midterm II 30％; Final Exam 30％, the dates of 3 exams will be announced in class.

ch.competencies: 具備數位學習與應用的能力
具備發掘問題與思考的能力
養成協調與領導的能力

en.competencies: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
To posses e-learning and computer skills
To be able to identify and solve problems
To continue to improve one‘s language skills
To develop the qualities of coordination and leadership

ch: 系所:限大氣科學學系、生醫科學與工程學系。年級:限一年級。
系所:限大氣科學學系、生醫科學與工程學系。年級:限非一年級。
系所:限數學系、光電科學與工程學系、理學院學士班、地球科學學系、地球科學學院學士班、生命科學系。
en: Department:Department of Atmospheric Physics、Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.Year:First Year only.
Department:Department of Atmospheric Physics、Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.Year:Non-First Year only.
